name: Hellversus
description:
*NOTICE! This is unofficial Helltaker project.*

"Hellversus" is 2D fighting games based on "Helltaker" by Vanripper. 

This game is developed in compliance with the author's derivative work rules.

The very first demo is available here. If you're interested in this project, check out Patreon!

■Controls:

WASD or Arrow key: Move

Z key : Light attack

X key : Middle attack

C key : Heavy attack

■Q＆A:

Any questions? Please check this link.

■Credits:

Original game "Helltaker" by Łukasz Piskorz - @vanripperart

"Hellversus" by Kyo-hei - @shibagani48
